FuncDef: This command configures the Cflowd sampling parameters.
CLIs: sampling { unicast | multicast } type { acl | interface } [ direction { ingress-only | egress-only | both } ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that the sampling command controls the sampling of unicast traffic on the associated interface/SAP.
Specifies that the sampling command controls the sampling of multicast traffic on the associated interface/SAP.

Specifies the cflowd sampling type on the specified virtual router interfaces. Values-acl - Specifies that the sampled traffic is controlled via an IP traffic filter entry with the action "filter-sample" configured..
Specifies the direction in which to collect traffic flow samples. Values-ingress-only - Enables ingress sampling only on the associated interface..
